product information:
The Samsung 225BW has a 22 inch LCD TFT display, which offers you an excellent viewing experience. The 5 ms response time of this Samsung flat panel monitor offers crisp picture along with reducing blurring of images. Wide viewing angles in this Samsung 22 inch ensures that you can see all of the screen. This Samsung 22 inch offers 16.7 million colors, so you can enjoy clear and bright images. Magic Tune software in the Samsung 225BW allows you to control every on screen display (OSD) with the mouse. To provide you with an optimal viewing experience, this Samsung flat panel monitor is capable of handling both analog video signals and digital video signals.
